thread.title_full: Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit reviewed by David

author: David
title: David
text:
I ordered my Hill Topper over the phone and indicated that I would be traveling to Seattle to have it installed. I live 3 hours and a ferry boat ride from Seattle. The person who took my order did not mention that Clean Republic needed to have the bicycle left to installation, nor communicated with other that I was going to drop off and pick up the same day.
After a bit of frustration by all parties, the unit was installed the same day. The unit works as advertised and has made riding just that much more enjoyable. Thanks Clean Republic for accommodating the situation.
